name: Commencement
description:
Your buddies promised you the time of your life this summer in the woods. After stories and dinner, you doze off and wake up after smores and story time to find that everyone is missing. 

There is something going on here, and there are signs of struggle that indicate your friends might be in danger...

Prototype TBC! Thanks for checking out our work!

Programmer - https://alchemicsoundscape.itch.io/
Artist - https://itch.io/profile/frogger128
Artist - https://twitter.com/chilopawbi
